resources.string: Foody Tells is a fast food company which believes in total customer satisfaction. We believe that every individual is unique and hence everyone has their own preferences and taste. We as a company respect that and as a result the company helps its customers to design their own custom meal through the app. In a way we try to develop a virtual kitchen between the chief and the client so that the client gets his meal according to his taste.

This app is meant only to be an educational purpose project. Hence it does not deliver the product. However, this is a fully functional app which helps to develop virtual connection between the chief and the client. This app is meant only for education purpose and is not business oriented.

I am a 21 year old Android developer currently pursuing Computer Science Engineering at LNMIIT Jaipur. A desire to make usable products, learning technologies and a childhood love for maths makes me work harder for my goals in the fast developing world of Computer Science.
